ILayer layer=mapView.getMapControl().getMap().getLayer("�ؽ�_region");
if (layer!=null && layer instanceof IFeatureLayer)
{
        ISymbol symbol=((IFeatureLayer)layer).getRenderer().getSymbolByFeature(null);
        if (symbol instanceof FillSymbol)
                ((FillSymbol)symbol).setColor(0xFF00FF00);
        mapView.getMapControl().refresh();
}
